mapper.select: SELECT A.INVENTORY_ID, A.INVENTORY_CODE, B.ITEM_CODE, B.ITEM_NAME, B.ITEM_TYPE, B.SPEC, A.AVERAGE_COST, A.CURRENT_QTY, E.CODE, C.WH_NAME, C.WH_CODE, D.EMP_NAME FROM INVENTORY A JOIN ITEM B ON A.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID JOIN WAREHOUSE C ON A.WH_ID = C.WH_ID JOIN EMPLOYEE D ON A.EMP_NO = D.EMP_NO JOIN COMMON_CODE E ON B.UNIT_CODE = E.CODE_ID

SELECT A.INVENTORY_CODE, COALESCE(A.UPDATED_AT, A.CREATED_AT) AS UPDATED_AT, B.ITEM_CODE, B.ITEM_NAME, B.ITEM_TYPE, B.SPEC, A.AVERAGE_COST, E.CODE, A.CURRENT_QTY, C.WH_CODE, C.WH_NAME, A.EMP_NO, D.EMP_NAME, D.HP, A.REMARK FROM INVENTORY A JOIN ITEM B ON A.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID JOIN WAREHOUSE C ON A.WH_ID = C.WH_ID JOIN EMPLOYEE D ON A.EMP_NO = D.EMP_NO JOIN COMMON_CODE E ON B.UNIT_CODE = E.CODE_ID WHERE INVENTORY_ID = #{inventoryId}
SELECT B.ITEM_CODE, B.ITEM_NAME, B.ITEM_TYPE, B.SPEC, C.CODE FROM INVENTORY A JOIN ITEM B ON A.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON B.UNIT_CODE = C.CODE_ID
SELECT B.WH_CODE, B.WH_NAME, B.ADDRESS, B.ADDRESS_DETAIL FROM INVENTORY A JOIN WAREHOUSE B ON A.WH_ID = B.WH_ID
SELECT B.EMP_NO, B.EMP_NAME, B.HP FROM INVENTORY A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO
